description: This task depends on the task "Update The Mifos Initiative Wikipedia Page" and involves translating the Mifos Initiative Wikipedia page https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mifos_Initiative Into Portuguese. Note that any student who makes significant project to close this task shall have great rewards as this task has a high coefficient.  Share the document you've written with the task mentor. Also, append your name to the submitted file in https://goo.gl/vJjxaP so that we know who did the work.
name: Translate The Mifos Initiative Wikipedia Page Into Portuguese ( Português )
